name: The Secret Lives of Toys
description:
This game was developped with two other students within a Game Design class at Université du Québec à Chicoutimi. We had to fit the theme "Small world" and chose to make an adventure game with toys being the main characters.

At this point, there's only one story to play, as we didn't have much time and were only beginners with Unity.  

Hope you'll enjoy it!
